page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content:
{ YELDERSLEY HALL},SQUARE 04200344,WAS BUILT IN 1768 FOR WILLIAM PEGG.IT HAS TWO AND A HALF ACRES OF WALLED KITCHEN GARDENS,TWO AND A HALF ACRES OF PLEASURE GARDENS,6 ACRES OF WOODLAND AND 6 ACRES OF PADDOCK LEADING TO A SMALL LAKE.OUTBUILDINGS INCLUDE STABLES,WORKROOMS,A SQUASH COURT AND A LODGE.
THE HALL AND OUTBUILDINGS HAVE BEEN CONVERTED INTO 7 SELF CONTAINED FLATS. SIX FLATS ARE OCCUPIED BY RENT PAYING TENANTS AND ONE FLAT IS USED BY THE PRESENT OWNERS.THE SQUASH COURT WAS SOLD TO NEW OWNERS IN 1977 AND CONVERTED INTO A HOUSE.THE LODGE AT THE GATES IS OWNED SEPARATELY.
THE FISHING RIGHTS TO THE LAKE ARE OWNED BY ASHBOURNE FISHIHG CLUB.
